title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 May 2016 - XWiki
content:

10:32 <ClemensR> do we have a release of 8.1 RC1 today?  
10:34 <evalica> ClemensR: yes - I'm starting it in 5 minutes  
10:34 <mflorea> has quit  
10:34 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <vmassol> has quit  
10:36 <ClemensR> evalica: ok, thanks, then I better stay away from pushing anything :) good luck !  
10:36 <evalica> ClemensR: :) thanks  
10:43 <lkrejci> has quit  
10:43 <lkrejci> has quit  
10:50 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:02 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <ujjwal> has quit  
11:05 <ClemensR> btw I made a fix for XWIKI-13380 , but this required me to parse out the spaces  from the HQL-query part that is required as user input in parameter  
11:05 <ClemensR> result is on a branch in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/d0227c15ebd1f68ee8b30266173254ee1cfa280f  ... I think I will merge it anyway despite of the convoluted code (after the release).  
11:06 <ClemensR> or are there any objections / suggestions?  
11:07 <vmassol> ClemensR: I don't know the code but doing a merge between RC1 and final seems dangerous to me as a strategy :)  
11:07 <vmassol> (but you know better)  
11:07 <vmassol> or maybe you meant merge it in 8.2M1?  
11:07 <vmassol> yup  
11:07 <ClemensR> I thought indeed to merge after the release to master  
11:07 <vmassol> Caty will create the branch and master will becomes 8.2-SNAPSHOT  
11:07 <vmassol> \*become  
11:07 <vmassol> ok  
11:08 <vmassol> we're in agreement ;)  
11:08 <ClemensR> ah, ok, then we both mean the same :)

21:58 <lanouettea> Hello, I'm trying to find how I can determine the order in which pages appears in the navigation pane/generated multi-page PDF. I'm using 7.4.3. Can anyone point me in the right direction?
